children.text:
Please take a few minutes to read this quick help so you can get the best out of the app. Scroll down through the 7 tips.
 1. You can disable this help or all help screens from the settings menu.
 2. You can always hide the menu bar by clicking on the MENU button on your phone.
 3. You can customize all paint effects and save up to 3 custom settings for each effect, just press an effect button for about 3 seconds to access customization, to overwrite default custom presets with your own, once you have desired effect press one of the 3 preset buttons for 3 seconds.
 4. The MMS over Wifi option will use the email to MMS gateway setup by each carrier. Please let us know if you have any problems with this feature.
 5. If you have trouble sending MMS try to use the 'Other Phone Applications' option and select 'Messaging'. That will use your phone's built in MMS application.
 6. When you click on SEND button, it is fully functional but pops up an advertisement,
 please consider buying the Ad-Free version of the app (to be released soon) which removes all ads.
 7. Due to Google's Android OS limitations, you will get better image quality if you use built-in phone's camera application to take pictures and then select the image as a background in this App by selecting From File from the Background Options menu icon.
 Send us your feedback and suggestions, we'd love to hear from you! Just click on the Question mark menu icon and then the send feedback button.
